overview:
Jeff Okubo is an online marketing professional with over 14 years of experience on the advertiser, agency, network, media, and affiliate sides of the business.

He is currently Partner and VP of Business Development with Net Tangerine, Inc. Prior to Net Tangerine, Jeff was in business development and marketing roles at Monster Worldwide, XQuest (aka Advice.com and Service.com), Swish Marketing (now Bonus Interactive), Netblue (now Epic Media Group), QuinStreet, Internet Profiles (aka I/PRO), and The Wall Street Journal/ WSJ.com.

A Silicon Valley native, Jeff received a BA in Advertising With Distinction from San Jose Sate University while working full time and paying for his own tuition. Interesting Jeff Tidbit: he and five friends once drove two vintage Land Rover Dormobiles around the world. They started in Beijing, drove through Asia, the Middle East, Western Europe, and across the United States back home to the Bay Area.

About Net Tangerine: Net Tangerine is a full service marketing and technology company that specializes in lead generation for companies that provide financial services for the under-banked market, email marketing, and data management. The company is headquartered in Palo Alto and also has a 25-person engineering and web design office in Shanghai.
